Posts.Content: Hello all, I just wanted to give you some information on the above email. Unfortunately, there plenty of hoax emails that get circulated these days. Please feel free to call the National Cancer Information Center whenever you receive them to check them out. Cancer Information Specialists can be reached 24 hours a day at 1-800-227-2345. http://www.cancer.org/docroot/MED/content/MED_6_1x_Lipstick_and_Lead.asp?sitearea=MED Take care and be well, Dana CSN Dana
Posts.Title: Interesting reading - FYI
